mapper.select: select COUNT(1) ORDER_COUNT,V_SEND_ORDER from t_send_tab GROUP BY V_SEND_ORDER HAVING ORDER_COUNT > 1

select * from ( select SUM(V_MONEY) ORDER_MONEY,V_BELONG_USER from T_ORDER_TAB where to_days(V_UPDATE_TIME) = to_days(now()) and (V_STATUS = '1' or V_STATUS='3') group by V_BELONG_USER ) tot left join t_bond_today tbt on tot.V_BELONG_USER = tbt.V_USER_ID where tbt.V_COUNT_RECEIVABLES != tot.ORDER_MONEY

select ifnull(sum(V_MONEY),0) TOPUP_MONEY from t_user_topup
to_days(V_TOPUP_TIME) = to_days(now()) and V_STATUS = '1' and V_TOPUP_USER = #{USER_ID}
mapper.update: update t_bond_today set V_COUNT_RECEIVABLES = V_COUNT_RECEIVABLES + #{syMoney},V_ALI_RECEIVABLES = V_ALI_RECEIVABLES+ #{syMoney}, V_SURPLUS_BOND = V_SURPLUS_BOND + #{MONEY} where V_USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.select: select * from ( select SUM(V_MONEY) ORDER_MONEY,V_BELONG_APP from T_ORDER_TAB where to_days(V_UPDATE_TIME) = to_days(now()) and (V_STATUS = '1' or V_STATUS='3') group by V_BELONG_APP ) tot left join t_collection_tab tct on tot.V_BELONG_APP = tct.V_APP_ID where tct.V_TOTAL_COLLECTION != tot.ORDER_MONEY

select ifnull(sum(V_MONEY),0) COMMISSION_MONEY from t_commission_tab
to_days(V_COMMISSION_TIME) = to_days(now()) and V_STATUS = '1' and V_APP_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.update: update t_collection_tab set V_ALI_COLLECTION = V_ALI_COLLECTION + #{syMoney},V_TOTAL_COLLECTION = V_TOTAL_COLLECTION+ #{syMoney}, V_CASH_COLLECTION = V_CASH_COLLECTION + #{syMoney} where V_APP_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.select: select * from ( select SUM(V_MONEY) ORDER_MONEY,V_BELONG_ACCOUNT from T_ORDER_TAB where to_days(V_UPDATE_TIME) = to_days(now()) and (V_STATUS = '1' or V_STATUS='3') group by V_BELONG_ACCOUNT ) tot left join t_account_collection tac on tot.V_BELONG_ACCOUNT = tac.V_ACCOUNT_ID where tac.V_TOTAL_MONEY != tot.ORDER_MONEY
mapper.update: update t_account_collection set V_TOTAL_MONEY = V_TOTAL_MONEY + #{syMoney},V_ALI_MONEY = V_ALI_MONEY+ #{syMoney} where V_ACCOUNT_ID = #{USER_ID}
